Name: Nanjing to Taicang
In English: [No guidance, since pilots can follow the banks of the river]

Name: Taicang to Nanhuizui
Map Text: 《太倉港口》開船，用丹乙針，一更船平《吳淞江》。 用乙卯針，一更船到《南匯嘴》。
In English: Starting from Taicang Harbor (太倉港口), sail on a course of 105° (乙, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) until even with Huangpu River (吳淞江). Sail on a course of 97.5° (乙卯, ESE) for 2.4 hours (1 更) to reach Nanhuizui (南匯嘴).
JVG Mills: The ship starts from Taicangjiang [Liuhe], and steers exactly 105 degrees; after 1 watch the ship is level with Wusongjiang [Wusong bar]. Steer 105 degrees-90 degrees; after 1 watch, the ship reaches Nanhuicui.

Name: Zhaobaoshan to Jiushan
Landmarks: 招寶,茶山,大小七山,東霍山,東霍山,西後門,大磨山,小磨山,崎頭,昇羅嶼,雙嶼港,孝順洋,九山
Map Text: 平《招寶》，用乙辰針，三更船出洪。 打水丈六七正路。 見《茶山》在東北。 邊過，用巽巳針，四更船見《大小七山》。 打水六七托。 用坤申及丁未針，三更船取《霍山》。 用丹午針，三更船取《(東)霍山》。 用丹午針，六(更船取)《西後門》。 用巽巳針，三更船取《大磨山》。 用乙辰針，一更船取《小磨山》轄《崎頭》《昇羅嶼》。 用丁未針，一更船出《雙嶼港》。 用丙午針，一更船取《孝順洋》。 一路，打水九托九平。 《九山》對《九山》西南邊，有一沆礁打浪。
In English: When level with Zhaobao (招寶), sail on a course of 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to exit the main current. The 5 fathom (6-7 托) contour is the correct course to the mouth of the river. You will sight Sheshan Island (茶山) on the northeast side. After passing it, sail on a course of 142.5º (巽巳, SSE) for 9.6 hours (4 更) until you see Gutzlaff Island (大小七山). Keep your soundings in 5 fathoms (6-7 托). Sail on a course of 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours to (3 更)  reach Tanhu Island (灘山 mislabeled as 霍山). Following the course 180º (午, due south), sail 7.2 hours to reach Donghuo Island (霍山). Following the course 180º (午, due south), sail  14.4 hours to reach Xihoumen. Following the course 142.5° (巽巳, SSE), sail 7.2 hours to reach Damoshan. Following the course 112.5º (乙辰, ESE), sail 2.4 hours to pass Xiaomoshan, round the Qitou [Ocean], and reach Shengluoyu. Following the course 202.5º (丁未, SSW), sail 2.4 hours to exit Shuangyu Port. Following the course 172.5º (丙午, SSE), sail 2.4 hours through Filial Piety Ocean. All the way, the depth of water is nine to nine and a half 托. From Jiushan and toward the southwest there is a reef making waves.
JVG Mills: When level with Zhaobao (near Gaoqiao), steer 105-120 degrees. After 3 watches the ship goes out into the main. Take a sounding 6 or 7 zhang; that is the correct course. You sight Chashan on the northeast side; After passing it steer 135-150 degrees; after 4 watches the ship sights Da (Daqishan, 30o 48' N) and Xiao qishan (Hen and Chicks). Take a sounding, 6 or 7 fathoms. Steer 225-240 degrees, then 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer exactly 180 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Heshan (Dongheshan, 30o 15' N). Steering exactly 180 degrees, the ship enters Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer 135-150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan, 29o 56' N). Steer 105-120 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaomoshan (Xiaomaoshan), rounds Qitou 29o 53' N), and makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship goes out through Shangxu jiang (Duffield pass). Steer 165-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaoshunyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel). Take soundings all along the route. The depth is 9 fathoms when you are level with Jiushan (Kueshan) islands. Opposite to Jiushan on the southwest side there is one sunken rock which shows above the water when the waves break on it (Heijiao, Holderness rocks). Navigate the ship carefully in all directions.

Name: Jiushan to Zhongjieshan
Landmarks: 檀頭山,江片礁,大佛頭山,東西崎山,羊琪,大陳,三母,直谷山,石塘山,狹山山,黄山,中界山
Map Text: 出水打船仔細，(用)甲辛午針，二更船平《檀頭山》。 東邊有《江片礁》，西邊見《大佛頭山》。 平《東西崎山》，用丁午針，五更船平《羊琪》及《大陳》《三母》。 黄礁前見《直谷山》。 用丁未針，二更船平《石塘山》。 用丁未針，三更船平《狹山山》外渦。 用坤未針，二更船取《黄(礁)山》。 打水十七八托平《中界山》。
In English: Get out of the water carefully in East, West, and South, sail for 4.8 hours to be even with Tantoushan. Jiangpian Reef is on the east side. Look for Dafotoushan on the west side. Even with Dongqishan and Xiqishan, follow the course 187.5º (丁午, SSW) and sail 12 hours to be even with Yangqishan, Dachenshan, and Sanmushan. In front of Yellow Reef, look for Zhigushan. Following the course 202.5º (丁未, SSW), sail for 4.8 hours to be even with Shitangshan. Following the course 202.5º (丁未, SSW), sail for 7.2 hours to be to pass outside Xiashan. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 4.8 hours to reach Huang(jiao)shan. Take a sounding to confirm 3m depth; even with Zhongjieshan.
JVG Mills: After 2 watches the ship is level with Tantou shan (29º 10' N). On the east side is Jiangbianjiao; on the west side you see Dafoshan (Dafutou). When you are level with Dongxi qi shan (Dong Jishan and Gaodao), steer 195-180 degrees. After 5 watches the ship is level with Yangqi (Pingfeng shan) and Dachen (Xia Da chen shan) and San mu (Shang Da chen shan, 28º 30' N), and Huangjiao (Shangxu). In front you see Zhigushan; steer 195-210 degrees; after 2 watches the ship is level with Shitang shan (Niushan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship is level with Xiashan (Pishan, 28º 05' N) and passes it on the outside. Steer 225-210 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Huangshan (Banmianshan?). Take a sounding, 17-18 fathoms. The ship is level with Zhongjieshan (Beiceshan?)

Name: Zhongjieshan to Furongshan
Landmarks: 東洛山,南己山,臺山,東乗西乗山,芙蓉山
Map Text: 用坤未針一更船取《東洛山》。 用坤未針一更船取《南己山》外渦船。 用丹坤及坤未針三更船取《臺山》。 打水二十托。 用坤未針三更船取《東乗西乗山》。 用坤未針二更船取《芙蓉山》。
In English: Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 2.4 hours to reach Dongluoshan. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 2.4 hours to pass outside Nanjishan. Following the course 225º (坤, SW), sail for 7.2 hours to reach Taishan Island. Take a sounding to confirm 30m depth. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 7.2 hours to reach Dongchengshan & Xichengshan. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 4.8 hours to reach Furongshan.
JVG Mills: Steer 225-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Dongleshan (Beijishan).  Steer 225-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Nanjishan (27º 28' N), and the ship passes outside it. Steer exactly 225 degrees, then 225-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Taishan (26º 59' N), take a sounding, 20 fathoms. Steer 225-210 degrees, after 3 watches the ship makes Dongqi (Nanshuangdao) and Xiqishan (Beishuangdao).  Steer 225-210 degrees; after 2 watches the ship makes Furongshan (Fuyingshan), and passes outside it.

Name: Hongshan to Beijiao
Map Text: 外渦平《洪山》，用坤申針及丹坤針，二更船取《北交》。
In English: Passing outside Hongshan, follow the course 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 225º (坤, SW) and sail 4.8 hours to reach Beijiao.
JVG Mills: When level with Hongshan (Zhizhudao), steer 225-240 degrees and then exactly 225 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Beijiao (Beiling sijiao, 26º 22' N)

Name: Dongluoshan to Xiaoxiyang
Landmarks: 東洛山門,鳳凰山,南己山,臺山,東乗,芙蓉山,小西洋山
Map Text: 《東洛山門》內過，用庚申及坤申針，一更船平《鳳凰山》過《南己山》。 打水十三托。 用坤未針，三更船取《臺山》內過。 用坤未針，三更船取《東乗》內過。 船取坤未針，二更船取《芙蓉山》內過。 用丁未針，一更船過《小西洋山》。
In English: Passing inside of Dongluoshan, follow the course 247.5º (庚申, WSW) and 232.5º (坤申, WSW), sailing for 2.4 hours to pass Phoenix Mountain and Nanji. Take a sounding to confirm 19.5m depth. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 7.2 hours to pass insideTaishan. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 7.2 hours to pass inside Dongcheng. Following the course 217.5º (坤未, SSW), sail for 4.8 hours to pass inside Furongshan. Following the course 202.5º (丁未, SSW), sail for 2.4 hours to pass Xiaoxiyang.
JVG Mills: Passing within Dongleshan men (the passage westward of Beijishan), steer 255-240 degrees, and then 225-240 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Fenghuangshan (27º 41' N). On passing Nanjishan (27º 28' N) take a sounding 13 fathoms. Steer 225-210 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Taishan (26º 59' N) and passes inside it. Steer 225-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Dongqi (Nanshuangdao), and passes inside it. The ship steers 225-210 degrees, and after 2 watches the ship makes Furongshan (Fuyingshan) and passes inside it. Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship passes Xiao xi yang shan (Isimasidao).

Name: Xiaoxiyang to Dinghai
Map Text: 用丁午針，一更船取《北交頭門》。 內過沿山，取《定海》所前過。
In English: Following the course 187.5º (丁午, SSW), sail for 2.4 hours to reach Beijiaotou. Go in, along the island to pass in front of Dinghai.
JVG Mills: Steer 195-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Beijiaotou men (the passage between Beilingisjiao and Beixu (is), 26º 22' N). Pass within it. Follow the mountains, make Dinghaisuo (Dinghaitown) and pass in front of it.

Name: Around Wuhushan
Map Text: 用丁午針，二更船取《五虎山》。
In English: Following the course 187.5º (丁午, SSW), sail for 4.8 hours to reach Wuhushan.
JVG Mills: Steer 195-180 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Wuhushan (Huangqishan, 26º 05' N).

Name: Wuhushan to Niushan
Map Text: 用乙辰針，平《官塘》二礁外渦。 用丙巳針，取《東沙》。 《東沙》用丹巳針，三更船平《牛山》。
In English: Follow the course 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) to pass ouside the Guantang second reef. Follow the course 157.5º (丙巳, SSE) to reach Dongsha.
JVG Mills: Steer 105-120 degrees; come level with the two rocks called Guantang (Jixingjiao, 26º 05' N), and pass outside them. Steer 165-150, make Dongsha (Xichuandao). From Dongsha steer exactly 150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship is level with Niushan (25º 25' N).

Name: Samudera Pasai to Berkey
Landmarks: 蘇門答剌,急水湾,巴碌頭,甘杯港,亞路,單嶼,雙嶼,雞骨嶼
Map Text: 《蘇門答剌》開船， 用丑艮及乙艮針，五更船平《急水湾》。 《巴碌頭》有淺。 用艮巽針，五更船取《甘杯港》。 用艮巽針，十五更船平《亞路》。 用乙艮針，五更船取《單嶼》。 再用艮巽針，四更船取《雙嶼》。 用丹巽及辰巽針，十五更船取《雞骨嶼》。
In English: Sailing from the opening of Samudera Pasai, follow courses 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 112.5º (乙辰, ESE), sail 12 hours to even with Meunasah Asan. East Aceh has shallows. Following the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sail for 12 hours to reach Kuala Langsa. Following the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sail for 36 hours to even with Medan. Following the course 112.5º (乙辰, ESE), sail for 12 hours to reach Berhala. Then, follow the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sailing for 9.6 hours to reach Shuangyu. Following courses 135º (巽, SE) and 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sail for 36 hours to reach Pulau Berkey.
JVG Mills: The ship starts from Sumendala [Kuala Pasai, 97 13' E]; steer 30-45 and [then] 105-120; after 5 watches the ship is level with Jishuiwan [Udjung Djambuaje, 5 15' N] [and then] Balu tou [Udjung Peureula, 4 54' N]; there are shoals.  Steer 120-135; after 5 watches the ship makes Ganbeijiang [Kumpai roadstead, 4 11' N]. Steer 120-135; after 15 watches the ship is level with Yalu [Deli River, 3 47' N]. Steer 105-120; [f. 16v] after 5 watches the ship makes Danxu [Berhala island, 3 46' N]. [f. 17] Again steer 120-135; after 4 watches the ship makes Shuangxu [the Brothers, ca 3 23' N]. Steer exactly 135 and [then] 120 [f. 16v]-135; after 15 watches the ship makes Jiguxu [Aruah islands, 2 53' N].

Name: Berkey to Malacca
Landmarks: 雞骨嶼,綿花淺,綿花(嶼),滿剌加
Map Text: 取《雞骨嶼》，用丹辰及辰乙針，三更船平《綿花淺》。 用乙辰及丹辰針，三更船平《綿花(嶼)》。 用辰巽針，十更船平《滿剌加》。
In English: Reaching Pulau Berkey, follow the courses 120º (辰, ESE) and 112.5º (辰乙, ESE), sailing for 7.2 hours to even with Mianhua Shallows. Following the courses 112.5º (乙艮, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE), sail for 7.2 hours to even with Mianhua Shallows. Following the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sail for 12 hours to even with Malacca.
JVG Mills: After making Jiguxu, steer exactly 120 and [then] 120-105; after 3 watches the ship is level with Mianhua qian [Amazon Maru shoal, 2 51' N]. Steer 105-120 and [then] exactly 120; [f. 16] after 3 watches [f. 16v] the ship is level with Mianhua qian [read Mianhua xu, 'Cotton island', Bukit Jugra, 2 51' N]. Steer 120-135; [f. 16] after 10 watches the ship is level with Manlajia [Malacca, 2 12' N].

Name: Malacca to Great Karimun
Landmarks: 滿剌加,射箭山,毘宋嶼,吉利
Map Text: 《滿剌加》開船，用辰巽針，五更船平《射箭山》。 用辰巽針，三更船平《毘宋嶼》。 用丹巽針，取《吉利》。
In English: From the entrance to Malacca, follow the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sailing for 12 hours to be even with Mount Banang. Following the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sail 7.2 hours to be even with Banana Island. Follow the course 135º (巽, SE) to reach Great Karimun.
JVG Mills: The ship starts from Manlajia; steer 120-135; after 5 watches the ship is level with Shejianshan [Bukit Banang, 1 48' N]. Steer 120-135; after 3 watches the ship is level with Pisongxu [Pulau Pisang, 1 28' N]. Steer exactly 135, and make Jili [read Jilimen, Little Karimun island, 1 08' N].

Name: Great Karimun to Longyamen
Map Text: 《吉利》門五更船，用乙辰及丹辰針，取《長腰嶼》。 出《龍牙門》。
In English: Karimun Gate is 12 hours sailing, folllowing the course 112.5º (乙辰, ESE) and 120º (辰, ESE) to reach Pulau Senang. Exit at Longyamen.
JVG Mills: From Jilimen [Little Karimun island, 103 24' E], for 5 watches the ship steers 105-120 and [then] exactly 120, makes Changyao xu [Pulau Satumu, Raffles Lighthouse], and goes out through Longya strait.

Name: Longyamen to Baijiao
Map Text: 《龍牙門》，用甲卯針，五更船取《白礁》。
In English: From Longyamen, following the course 82.5º (甲卯, ENE), sail 12 hours to reach Baijiao.
JVG Mills: From Longya strait, steering 75-90 [f. 15] for 5 watches, the ship makes Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 104 24' E].

Name: Baijiao to Dongzhushan
Map Text: 《白礁》過用癸丑及丹癸針五更船平《東竹山》外過。
In English: When passing Baijiao, following the course 127.5º (辰巽, ESE), sail 12 hours to pass outside Dongzhushan.
JVG Mills: After passing Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 1º 19' N] steer 15º-30º and [then] exactly 15º; after 5 watches the ship is level with Dongzhu shan [Pulau Aur, 2º 26' N], and passes outside it.

Name: Dongzhushan to Kunlun
Map Text: 《東竹山》過，用子丑及丹癸針，船取《崑崙山》外過。
In English: When passing Dongzhushan follow courses 352.5º (子丑???, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE), sailing to pass outside Kunlun.
JVG Mills: After passing Dongzhu shan, steer 0-30 and [then] exactly 15; [f 14v] the ship makes Kunlun shan [Grand Condore, 8 41' N], and passes outside it. [f. 13]

Name: Kunlun to Kê Gà
Map Text: 《崑崙山》外渦，用癸丑針，十五更船取《赤坎山》。 用丑艮及丹艮。
In English: When passing outside Kunlun, follow the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNW), sailing 36 hours to reach Kê Gà. Follow courses 37.5º (丑艮, NNE) and 45º (艮, NE).
JVG Mills: After passing on the outside of Kunlun shan steer 15-30; after 15 watches the ship makes Chikan shan [Point Ke Ga, 10 41' N, 107 59' E]. Steer 30-45 and [then] exactly 45

Name: Đá Bia Mountain to Phương Mai
Map Text: 《靈山》，用壬子及丹壬針，五更船平《洋嶼》取《筊杯山(嶼)》。
In English: From Đá Bia Mountain, following courses 352.5º (壬子, NNW) and 345º (壬, NNW), sail 12 hours until even with Cu Lao Xanh to reach Phương Mai.
JVG Mills: [f. 12v] From Lingshan steer 345-360 and [then] exactly 345; after 5 watches the ship [f 12] is level with Yangxu [Poulo Gambir, 13 37' N], and [then] makes Jiaobeishan [Nui Ong Co and Nui Ong Can, 13 54' N].

Name: Phương Mai to Cù-Lao Ré
Map Text: 《筊杯山(嶼)》，用壬子針，七更船取《外羅山》外過。
In English: From Phương Mai, following the course 352.5º (壬子, NNW), sail 21.6 hours to pass outside Cù-Lao Ré.
JVG Mills: From Jiaobeishan steer 345-360; after 7 watches the ship makes Wailuoshan [Culao Re, 15 23' N], and passes outside it.

Name: Cù-Lao Ré to Duzhushan
Map Text: 《外羅山》內過，(用)癸丑及单癸針，二十一更船平《獨豬山》。
In English: When passing outside Cù-Lao Ré, follow courses 22.5º (癸丑, NNW) and 15º (癸, NNE), sailing 50.4 hours until even with Duzhushan.
JVG Mills: [f 11v] Passing on the inside of Wailuoshan, [steer] 15-30 and [then] exactly 15; after 21 watches the ship is level with Duzhushan [Dazhoudao, 18 40' N, 110 28' E].

Name: Duzhushan to Daxingjian
Map Text: 《獨豬山》，(用)丹艮針，五更船。 用艮寅針，十更船平《大星尖》外過。
In English: From Duzhushan, following the course 45º (艮, NE), sail 12 hours. Following the course 52.5º (艮寅, ENE), sail 24 hours to pass outside Daxingjian.
JVG Mills: From Duzhushan (Dazhoudao, 18º 40' N, 110º 28' E), steer exactly 45 degrees for 5 watches; the ship steers 45-60 degrees for 10 watches, [other books indicate that the total of 15 watches shold be changed to 25.] comes level with Daxingjian (Pedro Blanco, 22º 19' N), and passes outside it.

Name: Daxingjian to Dawushan
Map Text: 《大星尖》，用丹寅針，十五更船平《南粵山》。 《外平山》外過，用寅針，三更船平《大甘》《小甘》外過。 用丹艮針，四更船平《大武山》。
In English: From Daxingjian, following the course 60º (寅, ENE), sail 36 hours until even with Nan'ao Island. Passing outside Waipingshan, follow the course 60º (寅, ENE), sailing 7.6 hours to pass outside Dagan and Xiaogan. Following the course 45º (艮, NE), sail 9.6 hours until even with Dawushan.
JVG Mills: From Daxingjian steer exactly 60 degrees. After 15 watches the ship is level with Nan'ao shan (23º 25' N) and Waipengshan (Nanpingdao) and passes outside them.  Steer 45 to 60 degrees, after 3 watches the ship is level with Dagan and Xiaogan (Brothers islands, 23º 33' N) and passes outside them.  Steer exactly 45 degrees; after 4 watches the ship is level with Dawushan (24º 20' N).

Name: Dawushan to Wuqiushan
Map Text: 《大武山》，用丹艮針，七更船平《烏邱山》。
In English: From Dawushan, following the course 45º (艮, NE), sail 21.6 hours until even with Wuqiushan.
JVG Mills: From Dawushan steer exactly 45 degrees; after 7 watches the ship is level with Wuqiushan (Wuqiuxu, 24º 59' N).

Name: Wuqiushan to Dongshashan
Map Text: 《烏邱山》，用艮寅針，四更船平《牛山(者)》。 用丑艮針，五更船取《東沙山》。
In English: From Wuqiushan, following the course 52.5º (艮寅, ENE), sail 9.6 hours until even with Niushan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 12 hours to reach Dongshashan.
JVG Mills: From Wuqiushan steer 45-60 degrees; after 4 watches the ship is level with Niushan, 25º 25' N. Steer 30-45 degrees. After 5 watches, the ship makes Dongshashan (Xichuandao, 25º 58' N).

Name: Dongshashan to Wuhu Reef
Map Text: 《東沙山》，用丑艮針，一更船平《官塘山》。 用丑艮針，一更船《五虎山》。 用丑艮針，三更船取《龜嶼》。 用丑艮針，一更船取《東湧山》外過。
In English: From Dongshashan, following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours until even with Guantangshan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours to Wuhu Reef. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 7.2 hours to Kusu. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours to pass outside Dongyongshan.
JVG Mills: From Dongshashan steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Guantangshan (Jixingjiao, 26º 05' N). [wrong here; and map is wrong in indicating that Guantangshan is on the east of the course from Dongsha to Guixu.]  Steer 30-45 degrees, after 1 watch the ship makes Wuhushan (Huangqishan).  Steer 30-45 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Guixu (Dongsha, 26º 09' N0. Steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Dongyongshan (Dongyinshan, 26º 22' N), and passes outside it.

Name: Dongyongshan to Nanji
Map Text: 《東湧山》，用丑艮針，二更船平《東乗山》《西乗山》。 用丑艮針，二更船平《臺山》。 用丑艮針，三更船取《南己》。
In English: From Dongyongshan, following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours until even with Dongchengshan and Xichengshan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours until even with Taishan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours to reach Nanji.
JVG Mills: From Dongyongshan steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Dongqishan (Nanshuangdao) and Xiqishan (Beishuangdao).

Code: Steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship is level with Taishan (26º 59' N
Steer 30-45 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanji (27º 28' N)

Name: Nanji to Damianshan
Map Text: 用丑艮針，二更船取《東洛山》。 用丑艮針，一更船平《中界山》及《黄山》。 用癸丑針，三更船取《狹山》外過。 用癸丑針，三更船平《直谷山》。 用癸丑針，二更船取《羊琪山》及《大陳》《三母山》。 用子癸針，二更船取《東西岳山》。 用子癸針，三更船取《檀(佛)頭山》外過。 對開有礁内外過船。 東北邊有沉礁打辰，子細內外過船。
In English: Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 4.8 hours to reach Dongluoshan. Following the course 37.5º (丑艮, NNE), sail 2.4 hours until even with Zhongjieshan and Huangshan. Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours to pass outside Dishan. Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours until even with Jigu Island. Following the course 22.5º (癸丑, NNE), sail 4.8 hours to reach Yangqishan, Xiadachen Island, and Shangdachen Island. Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 4.8 hours to reach the Dongji Islands. Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours to pass outside Tantoushan. There is a reef far outside. Sail inside or outside. The northeast side has a sunken reef making waves, sail inside or outside carefully.
JVG Mills: Steer 30-45 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Dongleshan (Beijishan) Steer 30-45 degrees. After 1 watch the ship is level with Zhongjieshan (Beiceshan?) and Huangshan (Banmianshan?) Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Xiashan (Pishan), 28º 05' N, and passes outside it. Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship is level with Zhigushan (28º 23' N) Steer 15-30 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Yangqishan (Pingfengshan) and Dachen (Xia Da chen shan) and Sanmushan (Shang Da chen shan) Steer 0-15 degrees. After 2 watches the ship makes Dong Xi Qishan (Dongjishan and Gaodao) Steer 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Dantoushan (29º 10' N), and passes outside it; Appearing opposite is a rock; the ship can pass inside or outside it; on the northeast side there is a sunken rock on which the waves break, [navigate] carefully; the ship can pass inside or outside it.

Name: Damianshan to Taicang Port
Map Text: 用子癸針，三更船取《九山》及《乱礁洋》。 用壬子針，二更船過順《孝(順)洋》取《雙嶼港》。 用癸丑針，一更船取《昇羅嶼》《廟州門》刈過轄《碕頭》。 用辛戌針，一更船取《大磨山》。 用乾亥針，二更船出《西後門》。 用丹子針，取《(東)霍山》。 用丹子及子癸針，三更船取《灘山》。 用癸丑針，三更船取《七山》。 用乾亥針，四更船見《茶山》。 用酉辛針，三更船取《南滙嘴》收汧平宝山。 用辛酉針，三更船取《吳淞江》到《太倉港口》軗系船。
In English: Following the course 7.5º (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours to reach Jiushan and Chaos Reef. Following the course 352.5° (壬子, NNW), sail 4.8 hours to pass Xiaoyang and Shuangyu Port. Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail 2.4 hours to reach Shengluo Island, Miaozhou Gate, & [unknown]. Following the course 292.5° (辛戌, WNW), sail 2.4 hours to reach Damoshan. Following the course 322.5° (乾亥, NNW), sail 4.8 hours to exit Blackwell Pass. Sail due north to reach Lingshan. Following the course 7.5° (子癸, NNE), sail 7.2 hours to reach Tanhu Island. Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail 7.2 hours to reach Qishan Islands. Following the course 322.5° (乾亥, NNW), sail 9.6 hours to reach Chashan. Following the course 277.5° (酉辛, WNW), sail 7.2 hours to reach a point level with Nanhuizui.
JVG Mills: Steer 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Jiushan (29º 26' N) and Luanjiaoyang (southern portion of Niubishan Channel) Steer 345-360 degrees. After 2 watches the ship passes Xiaoshanyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel), and makes Shuangxujiang (Duffield pass). Steer 15-30 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan) and Miaozhoumen (the channel between Roundabout island and the coast), passes within the latter and goes round Qitou (29º 53' N). Steer 285-300 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan). Steer 315-330 degrees. After 2 watches the ship goes out through Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer exactly 0 degrees and make Heshan (Dongheshan, 30º 15' N). Steer exactly 0 degrees, and then 0-15 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer 15-30 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Qishan (Daqishan, 30º 48' N) Steer 315-330 degrees. After 4 watches the ship sights Chashan. Steer 285-270 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanhuizui, leaves the main, and comes level with Baoshan (Zhaobaoshan, near Gaoqiao).

Name: Sumatra to Ambergris
Map Text: 《蘇門答剌》開船，用乾戍針，十二更，船平《龍涎嶼》。
In English: Sailing from Sumadera Pasai, follow the course 307.5° (乾戍, WNW) for 28.8 hours to sail even with Pulau Breueh.
JVG Mills: The ship starts from Sumendala [Kuala Pasai, 97 13' E]; steer 315-300; after 12 watches the ship is level with [f. 18] Longxianxu [Poulo Rondo, 95 07' E]

Name: Longxianyu to Ceylon via Nicobar
Map Text: 《龍涎嶼》開船時月，用辛戍針，十更船見《翠藍嶼》。 用辛針，三十更船。 用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
In English: When starting from Longxianyu, follow the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sailing for 24 hours to see Great Nicobar Island. Following the course 285° (辛, WNW), sail 3 days. Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 5 days to see Ceylon.
JVG Mills: The ship starts from Longxian xu [Poulo Rondo] during a favourable month; steer 285-300; after 10 [f. 18v] watches the ship sees Cuilan xu [Nicobar islands]. Steer exactly 285 for 30 watches; [then] the ship steers 285-270 for 50 watches, and the ship sees Xilan [f. 19] shan [Ceylon].

Name: Longxianyu to Ceylon (direct)
Map Text: 《龍涎嶼》開船過洋，用丹辛針，四十更船。 又用辛酉針，五十更船見《錫蘭山》。
In English: When starting cross-sea from Longxianyu, follow the course 292.5° (辛戌, WNW), sailing for 4 days. Then, follow the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sailing 5 days to see Ceylon.
JVG Mills: The ship starts from Longxian xu [Poulo Rondo] and crosses the ocean. Steer exactly 285 [f. 18v] for 40 watches; the ship again steers 285-270 for 50 watches; [then] the ship sees Xilan shan [Ceylon].

Name: Around Ceylon
Map Text: 干千《佛堂》，用丹庚針。
In English: From the Ten Thousand Buddha temple, follow the course 255° (庚, WSW).
JVG Mills: From Fuotang [Dondra head] steer exactly 255.

Name: To Malé
Map Text: 用庚酉針四十五更船取《官嶼》。
In English: Following the course 262.5° (庚酉, WSW), sail 36 hours to reach Malé.
JVG Mills: Steer 255-270; after 45 watches make Guanxu [Male island].

Name: Malé to Ras Ma'bar
Map Text: 《官嶼》澑，用庚酉針，一百五十更船取《木骨都(束)》。
In English: Passing Malé, following the course 262.5° (庚酉, WSW), sail 15 days to reach Mogadishu.
JVG Mills: From Guanxu liu [Male island], steer 255-270; after 150 watches the ship makes Mugudu [Mugudushu, Mogadishu].

Name: Colombo to Maldives atolls
Map Text: 用辛酉(針)，四十五更(船)取《任不知(溜)》。
In English: Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 4.5 days to reach the Maldives atolls.
JVG Mills: Steer 285-270; after 45 watches make Renbuzhi [Fadiffolu atoll].

Name: Colombo to Kelaa
Map Text: 用辛戌針，五十更(船)，取《起來(溜)》。
In English: Following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 5 days to reach Kelaa.
JVG Mills: Steer 285-300; after 50 watches make Qilai [Kelai island].

Name: Colombo to Gapingnian
Map Text: 用丹戌針，五十五更(船)，取《加平年(溜)》。
In English: Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 5.5 days to reach the Gapingnian Passage.
JVG Mills: Steer exactly 300; after 55 watches make Jiapingnian [Kalpeni atoll].

Name: Malé to Gambari
Map Text: 用甲卯針，二十九更船，取《甘巴里(頭)》。
In English: Following the course 82.5° (甲卯, ENE), sail 70 hours to reach Gambari.
JVG Mills: Steer 75-90; after 29 watches the ship makes Ganbali [Cape Comorin].

Name: Malé to Kollam
Map Text: 用丹甲針，四十五更船，取《小葛蘭》。
In English: Following the course 75° (甲, ENE), sail 4.5 days to reach Kollam.
JVG Mills: Steer exactly 75; after 45 watches the ship makes Xiao Gelan [Quilon].

Name: Gapingnian Passage to Kochi
Map Text: 用乙卯針，二十五更(船)，取《柯枝國》。
In English: Following the course 97.5° (乙卯, ESE), sail 60 hours to reach Kochi.
JVG Mills: [Steer] 60; after 25 watches you make Kezhi [Cochin].

Name: Gapingnian Passage to Calicut
Map Text: 用甲卯針，二十八更船，取《古里國》。
In English: Following the course 82.5° (甲卯, ENE), sail 67.2 hours to reach Kozhikode.
JVG Mills: Steer 75-90; after 28 watches the ship reaches the country of Guli [Calicut].

Name: African Coast to Hafun
Map Text: 在華蓋星五指內， 去到北長星四指坐斗上山扮 坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒》雨
In English: At 5.4° S latitude, go to 10.3° N, follow on the star [unknown] Following the course 22.5° (癸丑, NNE), sail for 6.5 days to reach Cape Guardafui and Hafun.

Name: Andouli to Kavaratti
Map Text: 用卯針，十六更船，取《加加溜》。
In English: Following the course 90° (卯, east), sail 38.4 hours to reach Kavaratti Island.

Name: Andouli to Calicut
Map Text: 用卯針，十五更船，取《古里國》。
In English: Following the course 90° (卯, east), sail 36 hours to reach Kozhikode.

Name: Mangalore to Calicut
Map Text: 用丹乙針，二十八更(船)，收《古里國》。
In English: Following the course 105° (乙, ESE), sail 67.2 hours to reach Kozhikode.

Name: TBD
Map Text: 在三指觜角山勢去到六指二角，直遶那里寅上。 又在六指二角內山指坐布司上。 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
In English: At 9.7° N latitude [unknown]  go to 14.3° N latitude there ... Then, at 14.3° N latitude in the mountain, follow the latitude to city government[?] Following the course 45° (艮, NE), from 20.0° N latitude go to 20.4° N.

Name: Mangalore to Qalhat
Map Text: 用丹戌針，八十五更(船) 又用辛戌針，四十更船收《加剌哈》。
In English: Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 8.5 days. Then, following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 4 days to reach Qalhat.

Name: Anjediva to Qalhat (A)
Map Text: 用辛戌針，一百更船收《加剌哈》。
In English: Following the course 292.5° (辛戍, WNW), sail 10 days to reach Qalhat.

Name: Anjediva to Qalhat (B)
Map Text: 用丹戌針，一百二更船收《加剌哈》。
In English: Following the course 300° (戌, WNW), sail 10.2 days to reach Qalhat.

Name: Goa to Qalhat
Map Text: 用辛酉針，八十七更船收《加剌哈》。
In English: Following the course 277.5° (辛酉, WNW), sail 8.7 days to reach Qalhat.

Name: TBD
Map Text: 九指二角，用丹辛針，一百六十六更船收《都里馬新富》。
In English: From 19.2° N latitude, following the course 285° (辛, WNW), sail 16.6 days to reach ...

Name: TBD
Map Text: 此角頭也有十指 在十指山執力 去到十二指《吳實記落》 不到丹戌
In English: This penisula also has latitude 20.0° N. At 20.0° N latitude [unknown] Go to 23.2° N latitude [unknown] Do not go to the course  300° (戌, WNW).

Name: TBD
Map Text: 指坐布司上，用丹艮(針)， 十指去到十一指坐取船。
In English: ?-finger on 布司 (Pegasus?) use bearing 艮 (45°, NE) From 20.0° N latitude, sail to 21.6° N [something about riding...].

Name: TBD
Map Text: 觜頭去到十二指 坐乾亥小斗落， 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角 坐乾丹布司落 又去到十二指此角頭 子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》
In English: From Orion above (?) go to the 12-finger parallel (23.2° N), ride towards 乾亥 (322.5°, NNW) small Sagittarius & falling Orion (?). At the 12-finger parallel (23.2° N) go to 12.5 fingers toward Pu-ssu star and 子 (due North) for fifty watches, ship arrives at Hormuz.

Name: TBD
Map Text: 去十三指二角坐正北，
In English: Go to 25.6° N latitude and ride it straight across.

Name: Minicoy to Calicut
Map Text: 船收《古里國》 寅針五十更
In English: Sail to Kozhikode, 60° (寅, ENE) for 5 days,

Name: Minicoy to Cochin
Map Text: 寅針二十五更 收《柯枝》
In English: 60° (寅, ENE) for 2 days,

JVG Mills: [There is a hiatus in respect of the voyage to Ling shan [Cape Varella]; 'Shunfeng' gives the stages as 5 watches from Chikan shan [Point Ke Ga] to Luowantou [Cape Padaran, 11 22' N], 5 watches to Qienanmao shan [Hon Heo mountain, 12 24' N, 109 16 E], 3 watches to Ling shan [Cape Varella, 12 54' N].]

[Since Zheng He or his delegate often went to Thailand, we set out the main stages (as given in 'Shun-feng') for the voyages from Grand Condore to Thailand and thence to Pedra Branca on the main route to India. From Kunlun shan [Grand Condore, 106 36' E], 3 watches to Xiao Kunlun shan [The Brothers, 106 07' E]; 8 watches to Zhenxu shan [Non Khoai, 104 49' E]. From Zhenxu shan, 10 watches to Daheng shan [Poulo Panjang, 103 23' E]; 5 watches to Xiaoheng shan [Poulo Wai, 102 51' E]; 20 watches to Bijiashan [Khao Samroiyot 12 14' N]; 10 watches to Wuniqian [the mudbank off Hlaem Phak Bia, 13 01' N]. From Wuniqian, 3 watches to Zhuxu [the mudbank off Ban Hlaem village, 13 12' N]; and 5 watches to the shallows [off Maenam Mae Klong, 13 21' N]. On the southward journey ships followed the coast from KhaoSamroiyou; 5 watches to Guishan [Ko Hluam, 11 45' N]; 10 watches to Fuoxu [Ko lang, 10 51' N]. From Fuoxu, 10 watches to Da Sumeishan [Ko Samui, 9 27' N]; 15 watches to Daimeishan [Ko Krah, 8 25' N]; 10 watches to Suguna [Songkhla, 7 11' N]; 5 watches to Danijiang kou [Pattani river estuary, 6 54' N]. From Danijiang kou, 7 watches to Jilandan jiangkou [Kelantan river estuary, 6 11' N]; 4 watches to Sanjuexu [Pulau Perhentian Besar, 5 53' N]. From Sanjuexu, 3 watches to Jueyuanshan [Pulau Bidong Laut, 5 36' N]. From Jueyuanshan, 3 watches to Mianhuaxu [Pulau Kapas, 5 12' N]; 5 watches to Douxu [Pulau Tenggol, 4 49' N]; 5 watches to Pengheng jiangkou [Pahang river estuary, 3 31' N]; 5 watches to Qupan shan [Pulau Tioman, 2 46' N]. From Qupanshan, 11 watches to Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 1 19' N].

From Jilimen [Little Karimun island, 103 24' E], for 5 watches the ship steers 105-120 and [then] exactly 120, makes Changyao xu [Pulau Satumu, Raffles Lighthouse], and goes out through Longya strait. From Longya strait, steering 75-90 [f. 15] for 5 watches, the ship makes Baijiao [Pedra Branca, 104 24' E].

[The map contains no sailing directions; we can, however, set out the main stages derived from other sources. From Ling shan [Cape Varella, 12 54' N] 13 watches to Dongxidong [Great Catwick and Poulo Sapatu, 9 59' N]; 45 watches to Dongshelong shan [Tandjung Datu, 2 05' N]; 11 watches to Jialimada [Karimata island, 1 36' S]; 10 watches to Jiaolan shan [Gelam islet, 2 53' S]; 30 watches to Jilimen shan [Karimundjawa islands, 5 52' S]; 4 watches to Baolao'an shan [Djapara mountain, that is, Murjo Pegunungan, 6 35' S, 110 52' E]; 8 watches to Nacan shan [Lasem Pegunungan, 111 31' E]; 2 watches to Duban shan [Tuban, 112 04' E]; and 5 watches to Xincun [Gresik, 7 09' S, 112 39' E], or alternatively to Raodong [Jaratan].]

[The map contains no sailing directions. 'Shun-feng' (ff. 43-5) gives directions for voyages from Atjeh in Sumatra in Banten in Java, and we attempt a provisional explanation of the main stages. From Aqi [Atjeh, Kutaradja], 1 watch to Mantu mountain [Udjung Masam Muka, 5 35' N, 95 13' E]], 39 watches to Maolu [Barus, 2 01' N], 19 watches to Kuxin man anchorage [Tiku, 0 23' S], 3 watches to Zhiqumian [Pariaman, 0 42' S], 3 watches to Jializai man [Padang, 0 57' S], 11 watches to Jiliman [Inderapura, 2 04' S], 14 watches to Foulu luo [Bengkulu, 3 47' S], 19 watches to Jiliman xu [Batu Ketjil island, 5 53' S, 104 27' E]], 5 watches to Fouluwu xu [Sebesi island in Sunda strait, 105 29' E], 3 watches to Foulu shang xiang [Sangian island, 105 50' E], 4 watches to the great mountain of Shigong [Gede mountain near Tandjung Sekong, 5 54' S, 105 59' E]], thence to Pan-jang [Pandjang island, 5 55' S] in Banten bay.

[The map contains no sailing directions for the west coast of Thailand and Burma with the Nicobar and Andeman islands. The 'Shun-feng' (f. 46) gives the stages for the journey from Kuala Pasai to Chittagong, and we attempt a provisional explanation. From Kuala Pasai, 12 watches to Qienanmao shan [Poulo Weh], 45 watches to the 'southern head mountain' of Andeman [Mount Mayo, 11 23' N, on Rutland island], 12 watches to Pingzhongjian [Saddle Hill,, 13 09' N, on North Andaman island], 50 watches to Chitu shan [South cliff, 21 20' N, on the coast of Burma], 5 watches to Rangliedang head [Patenga point, 22 13' N, associated with 'Juldia' hill], near Chadijiang [Chittagong].

[Huang Shengzeng (Xiyang chaogong dianlu, ch. 2, ff. 7-7v) records an interesting itinerary from Bengal to Male island, which we paraphrase and summarize. From Bengal the navigator descends to latitudes where the altitude of Polaris is, successively, 4.5 fingers, 3.5 fingers, 2 3/8 fingers, 2 1/8 fingers, 1 7/8 fingers, and 1 3/4 fingers; then he passes Yinggezui [Namunakuli in Ceylon] mountain; after 5 watches he sees Tiezhen island [Great Basses reef]; after another 7 watches he sees Fuoshzuo mountain [Dondra head]; after anohter 5 watches he sees the mountain of Yali [Galle]; whence he travels to Guanxu [Male island in the Maldives].]
